question.text: A long solenoid of radius <math><mi>R</mi></math> carries a time <math><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfenced></math> dependent current <math><mi>I</mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow><mi>I</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mi>t</mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>-</mo><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfenced></math> . A ring of radius <math><mn>2</mn><mi>R</mi></math> is placed coaxially near its middle. During the time interval <math><mn>0</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mi></mi></math> the induced current <math><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>I</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></math> and the induced <math><mi>E</mi><mi>M</mi><mi>F</mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></math> in the ring change as:

options.text: Direction of <math><msub><mrow><mi>I</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow></msub></math> remains unchanged and <math><msub><mrow><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow></msub></math> is maximum at <math><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.5</mn></math>

At <math><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.25</mn></math> direction of <math><msub><mrow><mi>I</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow></msub></math> reverses and <math><msub><mrow><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow></msub></math> is maximum

Direction of <math><msub><mrow><mi>I</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow></msub></math> remains unchanged and <math><msub><mrow><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow></msub></math> is zero at <math><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.25</mn></math>

At <math><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.5</mn></math> direction of <math><msub><mrow><mi>I</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow></msub></math> reverses and <math><msub><mrow><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow></msub></math> is zero

solution.text:
I=I0t-I0t2
ϕ=BA
ϕ=μ0nIA
VR=-dϕdt=-μ0nAI01-2t
VR=0 at t=12
And IR=VRResistance of loop=0
